We collect the following User information, upon registration: Genre, sex;

The Organization may obtain personal information from the User when he saves this personal information on the Platform, or where appropriate, when he discloses this personal information otherwise, such as creating a User account and choosing a password, by logging in as a registered User to the Platform, by requesting a service, by providing information in his account, by contacting us by phone, email or otherwise, or by completing a form to enter a contest, inventory request, special offer or survey.
